addAdmin(address).custom:security: Admins can withdraw excess funds but not user staked tokens
addAdmin(address).details: Only the owner can call this function. Admin will have withdrawal privileges.

params._admin: The address to be granted admin privileges

removeAdmin(address).details: Only the owner can call this function

params._admin: The address to have admin privileges revoked

stake(uint256).custom:effects: Increases user's stake balance and total staked amount
stake(uint256).custom:requirements: Staking must not be paused and amount must be > 0
stake(uint256).details: Transfers tokens from user to contract and updates staking balances

params._amount: The amount of tokens to stake

toggleStakingPause().custom:security: Emergency function to halt new staking during incidents
toggleStakingPause().details: Only the owner can pause/unpause staking. Affects new stakes only.

unstake(uint256).custom:effects: Decreases user's stake balance and total staked amount
unstake(uint256).custom:requirements: User must have sufficient staked balance
unstake(uint256).details: Reduces user's stake balance and transfers tokens back to user

params._amount: The amount of tokens to unstake

unstakeAll().custom:effects: Sets user's stake balance to 0 and reduces total staked
unstakeAll().custom:requirements: User must have a non-zero stake balance
unstakeAll().details: Withdraws the entire stake balance for the calling user

unstakeAllForUser(address).custom:effects: Sets user's stake balance to 0 and reduces total staked accordingly
unstakeAllForUser(address).custom:security: Admin emergency function for user assistance or protocol management
unstakeAllForUser(address).details: Only owner or admin can call this function. All user's tokens are returned.

params._user: The address of the user whose entire stake will be unstaked

unstakeForUser(address,uint256).custom:effects: Decreases specified user's stake balance and total staked amount
unstakeForUser(address,uint256).custom:security: Admin emergency function for user assistance or protocol management
unstakeForUser(address,uint256).details: Only owner or admin can call this function. Tokens are sent to the user.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to unstake for the user
params._user: The address of the user whose tokens will be unstaked

withdraw(uint256,address).custom:effects: Transfers excess vault tokens without affecting user balances
withdraw(uint256,address).custom:security: Only allows withdrawal of excess funds beyond user stakes
withdraw(uint256,address).details: Only owner or admin can withdraw. Cannot withdraw user staked tokens.

params._amount: The amount of excess tokens to withdraw
params._to: The address to receive the withdrawn tokens

addAdmin(address).notice: Adds a new admin to the contract

removeAdmin(address).notice: Removes admin privileges from an address

unstake(uint256).notice: Unstakes a specific amount of tokens

unstakeAll().notice: Unstakes all of the user's staked tokens

unstakeAllForUser(address).notice: Admin function to unstake all tokens for a specific user

unstakeForUser(address,uint256).notice: Admin function to unstake tokens on behalf of a user

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: Withdraws excess tokens from the vault (not user staked funds)
